name: VR Flight Simulator (Ideoservo Games)
description:
VR Flight Simulator is an arcade-game in which you can fly in a small plane above several beautiful landscapes in virtual reality.

The following landscapes are available:

-The Alps and Mt Blanc (France/Italy)
-Guadeloupe (French Caribbean Island)
-Kilimandjaro (Kenya)
-Perito Moreno (Argentina)
-Grand Canyon (USA)
-Mt Cook mountains (New Zealand)
-Ha Long bay (Vietnam)
-Tahiti (French Pacific Island).

The following elements are needed to pilot the aircraft in VR:
- Google Cardboard compatible VR headset
- Made For iPhone/iPad bluetooth gamepad (current version was tested with the Steelseries Nimbus gamepad available from Apple Store)
